ThingDef.label: Flesh Tentacle
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install flesh tentacle
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a fleshy, muscled tentacle resembling a partial transformation into a fleshbeast.

ThingDef.label: Flesh Whip
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install flesh whip
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a fleshy, muscled tentacle with a blade at the end. The flesh whip makes an excellent melee weapon.

HediffDef.label: flesh pseudo-leg
HediffDef.description: A fleshy, muscled tentacle mimicked into a leg-like organ.\n\nIt has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s flesh pseudo-leg has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Flesh Pseudo-Leg
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install flesh pseudo-leg
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a fleshy, muscled tentacle mimicked into a leg-like organ.

HediffDef.label: flesh brachiopod
HediffDef.description: A fleshy, muscled tentacle that can be used to move the body, but not that well. These tentacles grow where the legs should be, but can also be used as hands to some extent due to their flexibility. \n\nIt has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s brachiopod has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Flesh Brachiopod
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install flesh brachiopod
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a fleshy, muscled tentacle that can be used to move the body, but not that well. These tentacles grow where the legs should be, but can also be used as hands to some extent due to their flexibility.

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Lung
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass lung
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue constantly regrows and replaces itself, making it immune to effects like lung rot and asthma.

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Stomach
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass stomach
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The harsh acid it produces is painful, but strong enough to prevent most food poisoning.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass kidney
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue secretes a special fluid into your circulatory system that somewhat enhances your ability to fight off diseases. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass kidney has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Kidney
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass kidney
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue secretes a special fluid into your circulatory system that somewhat enhances your ability to fight off diseases.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass liver
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The growing tissue has an outstanding filtering ability and can be somewhat purified of toxins that enter the bloodstream. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass liver has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Liver
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass liver
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The growing tissue has an outstanding filtering ability and can be somewhat purified of toxins that enter the bloodstream.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass eye
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue has excellent light sensitivity and is capable of performing the duties of an eyeball. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass eye has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Eye
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass eye
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass ear
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue has a keen sense of sound and is more than adequate for use as an ear. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass ear has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Ear
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass ear
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass nose
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue is effective in filtering harmful substances from the air. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass nose has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Nose
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass nose
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh.

HediffDef.label: fleshmass tongue
HediffDef.description: A cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh. The tissue has a sensitive perception of taste signals and is helpful in cooking to some extent. \n\nThe organ has its own neural structures and may become dangerous if removed.

li.letterText: Attempting to remove {PAWN_nameDef}'s fleshmass tongue has caused the twisting mass of flesh to attack. The fleshmass has detached from {PAWN_nameDef} and transformed into a fleshbeast!

ThingDef.label: Fleshmass Tongue
ThingDef.description: A mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It can be assembled on body to activate it and complete its final stage of development.

RecipeDef.label: install fleshmass tongue
RecipeDef.description: Install a mass of immature flesh with separate nerves with a fleshbeast-like structure. It will be activated to complete its final development. And eventually turn into a cancerous mass of semi-sentient flesh.
